content:
PHASE 5 COORDINATION

Validation and Hardening - prove the platform works.

Module ownership:
- Agent cli: owns cli/ directory (new Rust binary crate)
- Agent python: owns python/ directory (Python package)
- Agent test-exchange: owns integration tests for multi-agent
- Agent test-entropy: owns integration tests for entropy validation
- Agent perf: owns performance benchmarks
- Agent docs: owns documentation

DEPENDENCY GRAPH:
```
All tasks can run in parallel - no dependencies within Phase 5.
All depend on Phases 0-4 being complete (they are).
```

PARALLEL EXECUTION: All 6 tasks can start immediately.

NOTE: This is the final phase. After completion, the platform is ready for real use.
author: orchestrator
